doc.after: The worldwide spiritual headquarters of the Church of Scientology is located in the city of Clearwater Florida Officially known in Scientology as Flag Land Base this international headquarters was founded in the late 1970s when an anonymous Scientology founded group called United Churches of Florida purchased the Fort Harrison Hotel for 3 million
